_comment4: Valid examples for url and url-backup stratum+tcps://eu.flockpool.com:5555 Backup/failover stratum used in case of connection problems
_comment5: Wallet Address and Worker name in user. Example: RQKcAZBtsSacMUiGNnbk3h3KJAN94tstvt.WorkerName
_comment6: tune-full takes longer but should provide better hashrate
_comment7: You can specify different name/location for your tune config
_comment8: You can force miner to not tune. It tunes by default
_comment9: Or force it even if tune-config file already exists
_comment10: "log": "filename" can be used to create logfile of output
